title: Question about my profile
body: I would like to know the reason why my Ranked Flex 3v3 border is the one out of the three that is shown in my profile instead of my solo/duo queue border.

replies.body:
We've been getting a lot of players reporting that randomly swapping off what it was showing as default from before this patch. To help us raise awareness and priority  for fixing it, definitely take your report of this over to the [**Bug Report section**](http://riot.com/1F6ESQv) for devs to see. They really appreciate that help!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
